PIN.values: |< design the halo with this curve|
|Superphong supports three different types of light with phong shading: Direction, Point and Spot Light.&cr;&lf;Spot Light supports a projected texture and a fading value for a depth falloff|
|1. The type of each light has to be specified here:&cr;&lf;Directional - 0&cr;&lf;Point - 1&cr;&lf;Spot Light - 2|
